010package Fourier_Shape_Descriptors;
011
012import java.awt.Color;
013import java.awt.Font;
014import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
015import java.awt.geom.Ellipse2D;
016import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
017import java.util.List;
018import java.util.Locale;
019
020import ij.IJ;
021import ij.ImagePlus;
022import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
023import ij.gui.Overlay;
024import ij.gui.Roi;
025import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
026import ij.gui.TextRoi;
027import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
028import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
029import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
030import imagingbook.common.color.iterate.CssColorSequencer;
031import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
032import imagingbook.common.math.Complex;
033import imagingbook.common.regions.BinaryRegion;
034import imagingbook.common.regions.Contour;
035import imagingbook.common.regions.segment.RegionContourSegmentation;
036import imagingbook.common.spectral.fd.Colors;
037import imagingbook.common.spectral.fd.FourierDescriptor;
038import imagingbook.common.spectral.fd.FourierDescriptorUniform;
039import imagingbook.common.spectral.fd.PolygonSampler;
040
041/**
042 * @version 2020/04/01
043 * @author WB
044 *
045 */
046public class Private_Ellipse_Superposition_Animation implements PlugInFilter {
047        
048        static int StepsPerFullRevolution = 500;
049        static int StepsPerSecond = 10;
050        
051        static String PostFix = "a";
052        static int NumberOfContourSamples = 125;
053        static int NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs = 2;
054        
055        static boolean ShowPathPosition = true;
056        static boolean ShowOriginalContour = true;
057        static boolean ShowContourSamples = false;
058        static boolean MarkContourCentroid = true;
059        
060        
061        static Color    SampleColor = Colors.Magenta;
062        static double   SampleStrokeWidth = 1.0;
063        static double   SampleRadius = 2.5; //1.5;
064        
065        static Color    ContourColor = Colors.Blue;
066        static double   ContourStrokeWidth = 0.25;
067        
068        static double   ReconstructionRadius = 1.0;
069        static Color    ReconstructionColor = Colors.Green;
070        static double   ReconstructionStrokeWidth = 0.5; //0.75;
071        
072        //static Font font = new Font("Serif", Font.PLAIN, 10);
073        static Font font = new Font(Font.MONOSPACED, Font.PLAIN, 10);
074        
075        static AffineTransform CtrShift = new AffineTransform(1, 0, 0, 1, 0.5, 0.5);    // shift by (0.5,0.5) to move to pixel centers
076        
077        ImagePlus origImage = null;
078        String origTitle = null;
079        static boolean verbose = true;
080        
081        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) { 
082        origImage = im;
083                origTitle = im.getShortTitle();
084                //RegionLabeling.setVerbose(verbose);
085                return DOES_8G + NO_CHANGES; 
086        }
087        
088        public void run(ImageProcessor ip1) {
089                
090                GenericDialog dlg = new GenericDialog("Fourier Shape Composition Parameters");
091                dlg.addMessage("Fourier decomosition parameters");
092                dlg.addNumericField("Number contour samples", NumberOfContourSamples, 0);
093                dlg.addNumericField("Number of FD pairs (min. 1)", NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs, 0);
094                dlg.addMessage("Animation parameters");
095                dlg.addNumericField("Angular steps per revolution", StepsPerFullRevolution, 0);
096                dlg.addNumericField("Steps per second", StepsPerSecond, 0);
097                dlg.showDialog();
098                if(dlg.wasCanceled()) return;
099                NumberOfContourSamples = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
100                NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs = Math.max(1, (int) dlg.getNextNumber());
101                StepsPerFullRevolution = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
102                StepsPerSecond = (int) dlg.getNextNumber();
103                dlg.addMessage("Press ESC or close window to stop animation.");
104                
105                // ------------------------------------------------------------------------
106                
107                ByteProcessor ip = (ByteProcessor) ip1.duplicate();
108                
109                //  label regions and trace contours
110                RegionContourSegmentation tracer = new RegionContourSegmentation((ByteProcessor)ip);
111                //IJ.log("tracing done");
112                
113                // extract contours and regions
114                List<? extends Contour> outerContours = tracer.getOuterContours(true);
115                if (outerContours.isEmpty()) {
116                        IJ.error("no regions found");
117                        return;
118                }
119                
120                Contour contr = outerContours.get(0);   // contour of largest region
121                Pnt2d[] polygon = new PolygonSampler().samplePolygonUniformly(contr.getPointArray(), NumberOfContourSamples);
122                FourierDescriptor fd = new FourierDescriptorUniform(polygon);
123                //fd.print();
124                
125                String title = origTitle + "-partial" +
126                                String.format("-%03d",NumberOfContourSamples) +
127                                String.format("-%03d",NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs) +
128                                //String.format("-%03d",(int)(100*t)) +
129                                PostFix;
130                ImagePlus im = new ImagePlus(title, ip);        
131                if (ip.isInvertedLut()) {
132                        ip.invert();
133                        ip.invertLut();
134                }
135                brighten(ip, 220);
136                im.show();
137
138                long frameTimeMs = Math.round(1000.0/StepsPerSecond);
139                
140                boolean done = false;
141
142                while (!done) {
143                        for (int k = 0; k < StepsPerFullRevolution; k++) {
144                                
145                                if (IJ.escapePressed() || im.getWindow() == null || im.getWindow().isClosed()) {
146                                        done = true;
147                                        break;
148                                }
149                                
150                                double t = (double) k / StepsPerFullRevolution;
151                                long startTime = System.currentTimeMillis();
152                                Overlay oly = new Overlay();
153                                
154                                if (ShowPathPosition) {
155                                        TextRoi troi = new TextRoi(5, 0, String.format(Locale.US, "t=%.4f", t), font);
156                                        troi.setStrokeColor(Color.black);
157                                        oly.add(troi);
158                                }
159
160                                if (ShowOriginalContour) { // draw the original contour ------------------------------------
161                                        oly.add(makeCentroidShape(contr));
162                                }
163
164                                if (ShowContourSamples) { // draw the contour sample points ------------------------------
165                                        drawSamples(oly, fd.getSamples(), 0.5, 0.5);
166                                }
167
168                                if (MarkContourCentroid) { // mark the center ---------------------------------------------
169                                        oly.add(makeCentroidShape(fd));
170                                }
171
172                                // --------------------------------------------------------------
173
174                                { // draw the reconstructed shape from FD-pairs 0,...,mMax -------
175                                        int mMax = NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs;
176                                        Path2D path = fd.makeFourierPairsReconstruction(mMax);
177                                        path.transform(CtrShift);
178                                        ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
179                                        roi.setStrokeColor(ReconstructionColor);
180                                        roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth);
181                                        oly.add(roi);
182                                }
183
184                                //  draw superposition of ellipses ----------------------
185
186                                Complex cc = fd.getCoefficient(0);      // current ellipse center
187                                int mMax = NumberOfFourierDescriptorPairs;
188                                //                      RandomColorGenerator rcg = new RandomColorGenerator(1);
189
190                                CssColorSequencer csq = new CssColorSequencer();
191                                for (int m = 1; m <= mMax; m++) {
192                                        //IJ.log("drawing ellipse " + m);
193                                        //                              Color color = rcg.nextColor(); //makeRandomColor();
194                                        Color color = csq.next();
195                                        Complex c1 = fd.getCoefficient(-m);
196                                        Complex c2 = fd.getCoefficient(m);
197                                        Path2D path = fd.makeEllipse(c1, c2, m, cc.re + 0.5, cc.im + 0.5);
198                                        ShapeRoi rpoly = new ShapeRoi(path);
199                                        rpoly.setStrokeColor(color);
200                                        rpoly.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2);
201                                        oly.add(rpoly);
202
203                                        // mark the path position for t
204                                        Complex c12 = fd.getEllipsePoint(c1, c2, m, t);
205                                        //IJ.log("re: " + c12.re + " im: " + c12.im);
206                                        double rad = ReconstructionRadius;
207                                        Ellipse2D oval = 
208                                                        new Ellipse2D.Double(c12.re + cc.re - rad + 0.5, c12.im + cc.im - rad + 0.5, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
209                                        Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(oval);
210                                        roi.setFillColor(color);
211                                        //roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth/2);
212                                        oly.add(roi);
213                                        cc = cc.add(c12);
214                                }
215
216                                im.setOverlay(oly);
217                                im.updateAndDraw();
218                                
219                                long elapsedTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - startTime;
220                                int remainingTime = (int) (frameTimeMs - elapsedTime);
221                                
222                                if (remainingTime > 0) {
223                                        //IJ.log("waiting " + remainingTime);
224                                        IJ.wait(remainingTime);
225                                }
226                        }
227                }
228        }
229
230        
231        
232        void drawSamples(Overlay oly, Complex[] samples, double dx, double dy) {
233                double rad = SampleRadius;
234                for (Complex c : samples) {
235                        Ellipse2D oval = new Ellipse2D.Double(c.re + dx - rad, c.im + dy - rad, 2 * rad, 2 * rad);
236                        Roi roi = new ShapeRoi(oval);
237                        roi.setFillColor(SampleColor);
238                        roi.setStrokeColor(SampleColor);
239                        roi.setStrokeWidth(SampleStrokeWidth);
240                        oly.add(roi);
241                }
242        }
243        
244        void printRegions(List<BinaryRegion> regions) {
245                for (BinaryRegion r: regions) {
246                        IJ.log("" + r);
247                }
248        }
249        
250        void brighten(ByteProcessor ip, int minGray) {
251                 float scale = (255 - minGray) / 255f;
252                 int[] table = new int[256];
253                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
254                         table[i] = (int) Math.round(minGray + scale * i);
255                         
256                 }
257                 ip.applyTable(table);
258        }
259        
260        void darken(ByteProcessor ip, int maxGray) {
261                 float scale = maxGray / 255f;
262                 int[] table = new int[256];
263                 for (int i=0; i<256; i++) {
264                         table[i] = (int) Math.round(scale * i);
265                         
266                 }
267                 ip.applyTable(table);
268        }
269        
270        // ----------------------------------------------------------------------
271        
272        ShapeRoi makeCentroidShape(FourierDescriptor fd) { 
273                int crossSize = 2;
274                Complex G0 = fd.getCoefficient(0);
275                double xc = G0.re;
276                double yc = G0.im;
277                Path2D path = new Path2D.Double();
278                path.moveTo(xc-crossSize, yc);
279                path.lineTo(xc+crossSize, yc);
280                path.moveTo(xc, yc-crossSize);
281                path.lineTo(xc, yc+crossSize);
282                path.transform(CtrShift);
283                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
284                roi.setStrokeColor(ReconstructionColor);
285                roi.setStrokeWidth(ReconstructionStrokeWidth);
286                return roi;
287        }
288        
289        ShapeRoi makeCentroidShape(Contour contr) { // draw the original contour ------------------------------------
290                Path2D path = contr.getPolygonPath();
291                path.transform(CtrShift);
292                ShapeRoi roi = new ShapeRoi(path);
293                roi.setStrokeColor(ContourColor);
294                roi.setStrokeWidth(ContourStrokeWidth);
295                return roi;
296        }
297
298
